ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This work was supported by the Second Century Fund (C2F) fellowship of Chulalongkorn University (to Ilada Thongpan), the Research Chair Grant from the National Science and Technology Development Agency (P-15â€“50004), the Center of Excellence in Clinical Virology at Chulalongkorn University and Hospital, and MK Restaurant Group.
